name: Crazy Alien Invaders
description:
Abduct Humans and colonize Earth!

You want to build a Galactic Empire of Evil but humans are standing in your way!
Abduct them from Earth to escape the wrath of the Queen and to please the King.

Unlock more and more Humans as you reach your final goal! To colonize the Earth!
Upgrade your UFO so you can go further, faster, better into the Galaxy.
Claim your place as the greatest UFO threat in History of Mankind.

And Leo said: "Humans, we come in peace", but Paul with a radiant smile on its face: "Now, bend over!!!"
